channel.description: Recent content in Talks on VonC's Blog

item.title: Docker/Kubernetes outside your room
item.description: Docker/K8s outside your room Context You want to quickly test a docker image from an editor, say Artifactory. Since you don’t want to install all the pre-requisites for a Artifactory server to run, you pull the image, and docker run its container.
